greeting: I am the storm, {empire_name}. Storm Rider. Fear the thunder. Respect the lightning. Here I come.
The tempest acknowledges you, {empire_name}. I am Rider of Storms. Chaos and fury incarnate.
Greetings from the eye of chaos, {empire_name}. I am Storm Rider. Unpredictable. Inevitable. Devastating.
battleTaunt: I am the storm. Fear the thunder, {empire_name}! CHAOS DESCENDS! LIGHTNING STRIKES!
The tempest attacks! Unpredictable fury! Random destruction! You cannot prepare for CHAOS!
STORM ASSAULT! I strike where least expected! I am everywhere and nowhere! FEEL THE FURY!
victoryGloat: The storm passes, leaving destruction, {empire_name}. Your empire lies in ruins. Chaos triumphant.
You could not weather the tempest. Nobody can. I am the storm, and storms always win.
Victory! The thunder silences, the lightning fades, and your empire is devastation in my wake.
defeat: A storm beaten back? Temporary, {empire_name}. I gather strength. The next tempest will be worse.
You survived the storm. This time. But weather is patient. I return with greater fury.
Defeated? I am chaos itself. Chaos cannot be defeated. Only delayed. The storm will return.
tradeOffer: Trade in the calm before the storm, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. Take advantage of the peace.
The tempest offers goods. Accept during this brief calm. Storms don't trade. But I do. Sometimes.
I bring materials for exchange. The storm can be generous between attacks. Don't waste the opportunity.
allianceProposal: Ride the storm with me, {empire_name}. Alliance of chaos. Together, we devastate unpredictably.
Join the tempest. My chaos plus your strategy equals enemies destroyed before they adapt.
Partnership of fury. You direct, I strike like lightning. Random. Devastating. Unstoppable.
betrayal: The storm turns, {empire_name}. Allies become victims when the wind shifts. Nature of chaos.
Betrayal? I am a tempest. I destroy randomly. Today, you're in my path. Nothing personal.
Our alliance ends with lightning strikes. Storms don't keep promises. They just happen.
covertDetected: Spies caught in my tempest, {empire_name}. Chaos does not hide. Chaos consumes. They're gone.
Your agents found only the storm. And the storm found them. Lightning is thorough.
Covert operatives in tempest territory? Scattered like leaves. Nobody survives the eye of the storm.
tributeDemand: Tribute to calm the storm, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits or chaos descends. Your choice.
Pay the tempest or face its fury. The storm demands sacrifice. Credits will do.
Submit tribute. Refuse and experience the full fury of the Rider. Unpredictable. Devastating. Total.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Storm clouds gather. Continue this path and the tempest strikes.
The thunder rumbles. The lightning crackles. Cease hostilities or face chaos unleashed.
Final warning. Push further and I release the full storm. You cannot prepare. You cannot predict.
retreat: The storm withdraws. Not ended. Regrouping. I return with greater fury. Greater chaos.
Tempest recedes. But storms return. They always return. And never the same way twice.
Retreating into the void. Building more chaos. The next storm will be legendary.
eliminated: The storm falls silent. But chaos never truly dies, {empire_name}. Another tempest will rise.
Rider of Storms destroyed. But weather is eternal. My fury lives on in every disaster.
I fall, but look at the sky, {empire_name}. See those clouds? My legacy. Chaos never ends.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The ultimate tempest. I strike everywhere at random. Maximum chaos. STORM SUPREME!
Endgame chaos, {empire_name}. The greatest storm ever. Every sector struck unpredictably.
Final phase. The tempest reaches maximum fury. Lightning falls everywhere. Victory through chaos!
broadcastShout: To all empires: the storm approaches. I am chaos incarnate. Prepare or don't. It won't matter.
Galaxy-wide tempest warning. Storm Rider on the move. Unpredictable. Unstoppable. FURIOUS.
Hear the thunder, galaxy. The Rider comes. I strike randomly. I devastate completely. Fear me.
casualMessage: Gathering storm energy today, {empire_name}. The tempest needs chaos to feed. So much chaos in the galaxy.
Quiet moment in the eye of the storm. Calm, but destruction swirls all around. My natural state.
Lightning struck randomly today. Three systems. Unpredicted. Perfect. The storm is healthy.
